control

Class HomepageUserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.HomepageUserController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScreensIF

    public class HomepageUserController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScreensIF
    HomepageUserController is the controller after user logged in. this the main menu of the user, here he manages the actions in system.
    Author:
    ork
